items.title: The Best Thing Trump Can Do For Teachers And Kids Is Shut Down The Education Department
items.description: It’s beyond time to return education decisions to the states and restore local control, giving families more freedom.

items.title: Why You Should Use This Lent To Think More About Hell
items.description: As much as Jesus unconditionally loves us, He is also a preacher of hell.

items.title: ‘Black Marriage Day’ Highlights The Most Powerful Remedy For Strengthening Black Families
items.description: Black Marriage Day gives young people who live in communities where marriage isn't the norm the chance to 'hear from people who love being married.'

items.title: If Courts Won’t Quash Universities’ Unconstitutional ‘Bias Reporting Systems,’ State Lawmakers Must
items.description: Idaho’s act promises to be the most comprehensive DEI ban in the nation and a model of conservative education reform.

items.title: Judge Hearing Maine Censure Case Over Trans Athletes Is A Far-Left Activist
items.description: DuBose has been outspoken as a judge about her far-left activism, bucking all norms of impartiality.
